content: You have already talked to this NPC today

So please, do come visit us more often!
Let's fish together, collect together,
and share these precious moments with us.

Hello there, we have a new friend joining us!
Our little bubble world is quite popular, isn't it?
Hmm...{短暂停}Haven't we met yesterday?

I never quite understood why Sani said
she felt like going beachcombing whenever she saw me,
until I caught a{短暂停} jellyfish in the tidal flats.

[Splash-thud—]
I'm imitating the sound of slipping at the tideline,
An experience I've gained from my numerous failures at the beach.

About conversation topics... (thinking){短暂停}
I suppose you're curious about my work?

Every spring, I collect a particular type of flower petal,
Small and pink in nature,
When brewed with black tea, they produce the most fascinating fragrance.

Recently, when asked about the Astralink clothing store...
(thinking)
As long as clothes are practical and don't restrict movement, nothing else matters.

Sometimes, I find myself waking up in unfamiliar places,
It seems to happen after performances,
Creating these rather peculiar... episodes of memory discontinuity.

Unknown plants, berries, and mushrooms...
I'm so curious about all of them! If you have any,
please let me taste- no, I mean examine them~ Yeep!

You look somewhat familiar...
My apologies, I'm not very good at remembering names that aren't gemstones.
Intuitively speaking, I'm quite happy to see you.
A New Friend I Just Met
Stranger

Have we just met?
Was it on the Astralink transit where we first encountered each other?

To think you're actually blood relatives!
It seems the bond between you
was already connected deep within the threads of fate at birth.

So you're a friend of our Astralink liaison?
Your fashion sense is quite refined,
I noticed your{短暂停} coordination right away.

This morning, a mineral from the cabinet above my bed hit my head,
And something miraculous happened, bhan!
I can remember every single name our Astralink liaison mentioned!

This height, this gaze,
This fashion style, and the wind that follows their steps...

I know of another secret hideaway...
Next time you come to visit us,
Perhaps I could show you that special place!

I've written down all those
"non-existent" stories
from Parade Station's late-night broadcast
in my notebook.

Oh, worry not,
Amputation won't be necessary for now.

I used to detest repetitive tasks,
They would wear away at my passion and thoughts about life,
Until I learned to fish here.
The Omni-Gallery has books about customs and cultures from different worlds.\nWhen I wake up from performances, I like to browse through them.

Yesterday, I came across an interesting note about "a certain world bubble being uninhabitable,
completely covered in green moss."
Despite clear signs of life having existed there, everything was blanketed in moss.

It rained earlier,
And now mushrooms have sprouted across the grass.
Oh my, these are quite peculiar specimens...

Last night, as I observed the celestial river,
I sensed there would be a delightful surprise about "friends",
And here you are today.
We've been dear companions for many years now
I'll go back and\nconfirm with our contact.

Oh, you're from the liaison?
I am <color=#8AAB4B>Suye</color>,
And with that, we are acquainted.

I'm not very good at remembering names,
but I know you're friends with... um... that person,
yes, that one.

Have you ever gazed up carefully at the Celestial River?
They say it holds
the trajectory of everyone's destiny...

Well, I cannot perform this technique yet.
But at least I shall maintain my scholarly dignity!

But I believe there should be five great problems.
Because we still have "What to eat for afternoon tea" and
"What to eat for late-night snacks".

...(contemplating)
This exceeds my understanding...
How can one be closer than family? What does that even mean?

Oh, a new friend?
Our Astralink contact invited you, right?
Interesting... Welcome! I'm <color=#8AAB4B>Rebella</color>.

My name is <color=#8AAB4B>Suye</color>,
And with that, we are now acquainted.

A pleasure to make your acquaintance! I am <color=#8AAB4B>Manna</color>.
Perhaps we could engage in some scholarly exchange...
*ahem* By which I mean exchanging lobster-catching techniques!

The teachers at the Academia once said,
"Knowing many principles doesn't necessarily mean one can live life well."
It sounds reasonable, but...

Or perhaps...
What you truly miss is our Astralink liaison—
The friend who brought joy to your life?

I do favor yellow as a gentle base tone for coordination,
But I would never describe it as the yellow of twilight,
Nor tell others that "I'm wearing twilight"...

Adding little surprises to repetitive tasks
is my secret to keeping the creative spark alive.
Hmm, I suppose even searching for my brushes every day counts as something novel...

I invented a new eye mask!
When I sleep with it on, it feels like even my dreams have expressions.
Though when I woke up this morning, I discovered a slight inconvenience...

The three greatest conundrums of life are:
"What to eat for breakfast,"
"What to eat for lunch," and
"What to eat for dinner."

Oh, there's no specific purpose.
But you can make your own rules,
like, starting from the seaside first.
<size=64>"Shadow Clone Technique!"</size>
Betwixt life and death.
Heehee~ Manna's memory is quite impressive, wouldn't you agree?

Dear friend of our contact,
So you've returned to our Astralink once again!
I take it you find this place quite captivating, don't you?
childhood friend
acquaintances from work and studies
Classmates who are more than friends
Secret Crush

Oh! So you're a fellow playmate!
In that case, your friends shall be my friends as well.
I shall make sure to treat them with the utmost hospitality!

Mmhm, so you're a kindred spirit!
Manna understands! <size=64>She really does!</size>

Could it be a "lifelong nemesis"?!
To be paired up with my lifelong nemesis... no, that's not right...
To be inseparable like shadows... no, that's not right either...

What if,
What if your love isn't unrequited after all~?

<size=30>Judging by the reaction, I remembered the name correctly.
Indeed, Manna, my memory is quite reliable.
Misquoting poetry was merely a coincidence, happenstance, and an accident!</size>

Yee~ Welcome to our humble abode!
Please make yourself at home,
There's something quite mysterious about it~

This is the most important marker for distinguishing
between carefully crafted art and casual doodles,
Hmm, and it makes it easier to find if it gets lost.

A blade similar to the "Monster Head,"
Do not enter,
That is my lost "Et Cetera" Curiosity Shop.

What do you have,
that needs disposing of?

So, you should visit us more often at night.
Who knows? You might catch a glimpse of it too!

Seeing you walking together with our Astralink contact,
It suddenly reminded me of a dear friend I grew up with,
I'm rather curious, what kind of relationship do you two share?

Close friends...
They're such a reassuring kind of relationship to have.
Hmm, my friends haven't been reaching out to me much lately...

From unknown to familiar - that's how new friends are made!
Some say life is an adventure of constant new discoveries,
And finding new friends is part of that journey.

But I'll remember that you are family.
If you need it,
I can protect you in place of the contact person.

Are you observing the celestial river too? My frie...
Yeep~ You're not a resident from around here,
You must be a new friend! Hello, I'm <color=#8AAB4B>Frostia</color>.

Yip~ This is no April Fool's joke!
My name,
It means "The Merry Fool" at the card table!

I just returned from handling a commission.
The client had picked up a problematic drifting box,
and got their hand stuck in it for several days.
I like to think I'm pretty popular!\nThe folks on Artisan Street always chase after me with their mattocks when they see me.\nHow invigorating!

If you see a 30-meter-long noodle
hanging as a sign in front of a noodle shop in Metropolis,
don't doubt your eyes—I made that one!
When I was little, the grown-ups around me always said, "Don't skip your veggies, or you'll end up malnourished."
Family who are like friends

Growing up together, studying together, working together...
Are they that kind of familiar companion?
How wonderful, a friendship that flows endlessly through time.

You've only just met? My, it certainly doesn't feel that way!
But that's perfectly fine - as they say back home,
"First time strangers, second time..."

But there's only one true technique,
And that is sincerity—the most touching sentiment of all.

A new face...
Hmm, my friend hasn't been in touch lately,
And I haven't heard anyone mention inviting a friend...

My name is <color=#8AAB4B>Suye</color>,
And with that, we are now acquainted.

Hi there! I'm <color=#8AAB4B>Lauffie</color>!
I'm a cheerful jester who loves masks!~

If one were to predict a certain date...
The angle of Lumia and the direction of its long trajectory,
Within the unknown patterns.

You don't always have to draw actual landscapes when sketching from life,
Practicing with color blocks is also an excellent exercise,
Just remember to give each artwork a proper name.

Oh, if you happen to be here,
And find something living that shouldn't be alive,
Do let me know.

I thought someone was setting off fireworks nearby,
but it turned out the nearby minerals had mysteriously exploded.
Don't you talk to sunbathing chilies or potatoes?

This is a structured activity...
Oh? There are also creations that don't follow the rules?
I wonder what those might produce?

Each member has their own field of research.
My area of study?
Would you like to... take a guess? (twirls umbrella)

Oh, I'm conducting my routine observations of the surroundings,
Looking for any supernatural curiosities,
They tend to gather where there are crowds and abundant vitality.
Metropolis just released a new plushie called "The Clown Who Lost Their Mask." Only later did I discover it was made by my rival, the Letter Doll!

I wonder if that moss...
Could it come to life?
Yeep~ It would make for a splendid adventure scenario!

Yeep~ Making faces to scare sharks and such - how thrilling!
Would you like to try it with me sometime?

Would you like to pick some of our local mushroom buns?
I've heard that each region has its own unique varieties,
Each with its own distinct essence...

And then, someone secretly purchased others' mushroom spawn packets,
And streamed the cultivation process of mushrooms from different worlds,
For everyone to see~ Hahaha!
"Destined rivals"... Yeep! That has this feeling of "when we meet, we'll light up like festival fireworks and absolutely blast off into the sky!" How fascinating~

It's like when you step with your left foot first, and they step with their right foot first,
and both of you go "BAM!" as you collide—
{短暂停}that kind of perfect synchronization.

...(contemplating)
This exceeds my comprehension...
Are they friends or merely classmates in the end?

I was observing you from afar...
I believe this is our first meeting.
Oh, I was just pondering your name...

If you use shellfish tongs too much, they develop a peculiar seafood aroma.
No, you heard that right—not a seawater scent—
A seafood aroma~ *mysterious whisper*
You can always count on Mobai, but whenever he sees me and Sani hanging out together, he always gets so jumpy for some reason.

I'm truly not fond of beach foraging,
My last grand chase with the crabs
has already depleted my exercise quota for the entire year.

Whoever finds me might worry that I'm exhausted!
But truthfully, I don't feel tired at all.
Rather, my heart is brimming with joy from releasing all that energy!

If you're asking about the most entertaining spots around here~
First and foremost, I'd recommend my home, naturally!
And secondly, the Omni-Gallery, of course!

This time is no different,
I hope you'll find joy here!
Like me, treat this as a place where you can find respite.
is my friend
BFF
Secret Crush
Those who dare not love in silence
Yip~ Shh... it's the person I secretly admire

It sounds like,
This must be how mature adults socialize and make friends!
As expected of you.

Ah, unrequited love~
Such a beautifully bittersweet relationship, isn't it?
Have you considered confessing? Would you like some assistance?

Although I've helped express feelings in many ways,
like delivering "rings in balloons" as a messenger.

I'm Frostia, and I live nearby.
If you need a guide, I'd be happy to show you around.
I hope you enjoy your stay.

Greetings! I am the merry jester <color=#8AAB4B>Lauffie</color>!
If we were to define it in terms of cards,
I am the one and only Zero Joker!
You should spend more time with our gracious host! They're absolutely wonderful! (Multiplayer Chat Test - Client)

Yeep~ Waking up in different places each day,
I'd say that's my way of preparing "surprises" for myself!
Although, I suppose jumping out of bushes might startle people a bit.
Yeep~ Is it really that peculiar to have a conversation with gems sunbathing on the ground? Everyone who passes by keeps giving me these curious glances.

As the saying goes, "One must never mistake precious wood for firewood,"
So we must pick up everything that falls from the tree!
Besides, there's nothing to lose by collecting things~

Have you heard of the Revelare Academia?
The Academia studies all forms of knowledge in existence,
from fauna and flora to astronomy, geography, vinyl records, and literature!

Since our paths have crossed at this time and place,
Would you, like myself,
Care to explore our surroundings?
the one I secretly admire
First conversation with this NPC in history

What does it truly mean to "live well"?
Who gets to define that?
When you think about it, isn't it enough if you find it worthwhile yourself?

It's these small yet wonderful things
that sustain me,
helping me maintain my spirits despite life's various obstacles~.

Why do our crabs run around holding paintbrushes?
Could they perhaps have some peculiar artistic inclinations?

Shh... let me tell you a secret~
Glenn is constantly pressing buttons on his calculator!
But others say they've never seen Glenn act like this...

Our world bubble contains a most peculiar spore package~
If we were to cultivate it,
who knows what fascinating fungi might sprout forth!

Hmm, and those seagulls flapping their wings,
The drawings made with their feathers are particularly fascinating,
After all, they're the seagulls that even Sani can't defeat~.

I've fallen in love with the scenery here!
The winds across the fields are perfect for running while shouting:
"WHO ELSE CAN KEEP UP?!"

How about we rename our Astralink to "Lingering Path"?
*giggles* Yeep~ Why does this name
somehow remind me of fruit......
my classmate

However, your "fated showdown" is actually just a competition to see who can catch more fish, isn't it?
Manna has figured it out!

Yeep! A visitor I've never seen before!
Is this your first time visiting here today?
Ah, I see - you must be a friend of our contact person!
First conversation with this NPC today
We meet yet again! You're like those lively little ores, always bouncing around, and bumping into me!

If I punch too hard,
the threads of my clothes will burst open!

Metropolis has released some new hotpot base flavors.
As a soup base, it's quite throat-irritating,
but as a beverage... it seems just right, actually.

Rather than staying indoors,
I prefer to explore and wander about,
and the Omni-Gallery is particularly fascinating.

Last time after Dr. Moss finished eating,
he kept telling me he saw sea urchins doing hurdles.
<size=30>Though I suppose that's just like him.</size>

And they say there are some highly valuable fungi in there!
However, some of them were eaten
before they could even be sold.

I've heard that in a certain Eastern district,
there's a popular activity called "mushroom cultivation."
Since no one knows what kind of mushrooms will grow,

Don't ask me how I know this...
I was up until three in the morning last night!
Nemesis

Oh, I see! So it's what they call "growing up wearing the same pair of pants"...
But why did you all wear the same pants when you were young?
Was it some special pair of pants?!

Have we really known each other that long to be this familiar?
Just because I lost my brush doesn't mean we need to be that close{短暂停},
Oh, pardon me, I was just looking for my brush.

How should I describe this...
Ah, I know! It's like "kindred spirits recognizing each other"!
This must be what fortune tellers call "fate."

...Oh?
If it's from our contact,
Very well, I understand.
Yeep~ Who might you be? Are you a visitor to our island? Hello there! (Multiplayer Chat Test - Client)
You simply must spend more time with the Island Master - they're absolutely delightful! (Multiplayer Chat Test - Client)

In truth, upon lifeless things,
There dwells a vitality that should not exist.
That sounds{短暂停}rather ominous.

In simple terms,
I help clients by
dealing with various mysterious objects and supernatural tales that affect their daily lives.

But that notebook... it suddenly vanished!
Could it be that its contents were truly... "nonexistent"?

It's the kind of drink that's perfect for those solitary nights,
When you pop open a can and declare, "Time for a grand endeavor!"
And savor it with that very sentiment.

Whenever I see a sunny day, I always feel the urge to sunbathe something~
Then one night, I had this dream where I was chasing after sunlight,
holding up my blanket and running all night long in pursuit of it.

To counter that,
I created masks with "Impossible Parallel Letters" on them,
And to my surprise, it brought me some extra income!

Why do you look so eager...?
...
No pulling my tail, that hurts!

Standing before each different display case,
I can feel the pulsing rhythm of endless vitality,
and find myself moved by its presence.

"What exists in the Omni-Gallery
depends on what exists in this place."
That's what Dr. Moss said.
A New Friend

Hello, I'm <color=#8AAB4B>Medowlyn</color>,
I requested a search service and mistook you for someone else in my haste,
My apologies~.

Welcome to our Astralink! I'm <color=#8AAB4B>Rebella</color>.
Would you like to try
rolling down the hillside with me?

I was just practicing new latte art patterns at home,
though it wasn't going particularly well.
So I ended up making cup after cup...

Grand Cross... synchronized aspect...
By the arc of the heavens... all things are revealed...
Hm?... Strange, what was I just reciting?

Is there a way to solve this conundrum?
I feel like there should be an obvious solution,
but somehow I've wandered into a dead end...

The more art supplies I acquire, the better my artistic skills should become,
Even though I only use them to fill in color blocks,
Though I do tend to lose them often, which is, hmm, not very cute.

There's a certain beauty that can only be appreciated at night,
Like fireflies shimmering with their Faintglow,
And flowers that only bloom under the stars~.

I'm gathering materials to make shellfish tongs,
They need to be resistant to cracking and explosions.
Oh, I mean resistant to shore-dwellers cracking and exploding.

It's quite magnificent, you absolutely mustn't miss it,
Hmm, why was it pulled back{短暂停},
How did Momo explain it to me again...

The mushrooms around here...
They must have some special properties, don't you think?

But still! I firmly believe!
This is NOT a valid reason for Dr. Moss to reject my request to put the plum blossom stakes in the Giftarium!
A Familiar Friend
A New Friend
they are my family

I thought this place was empty,
but suddenly, a humanoid anomaly materialized.
You are... (thinking)
Our Astralink liaison has already greeted me~ You're most welcome to join us!

<size=30>So that's why in many action movies,
the actors' clothes mysteriously "vanish" during fights.
(Lost in thought) Hmm... hmm?</size>

The clock of all things never ceases,
Like how the number of flower petals is not random.

A friend told me that the air after rain is rich in oxygen and can effectively improve your memory!
<size=30>Which friend was it who said that again...</size>

There's this book called "The Hard Way to Savor,"
It sounds like it would teach you how to cook rocks for dinner,
But when I opened it, it was just full of photos of crabs and lobsters!

Yeep~ But what exactly is this bond you speak of?
Would you tell me? (curious)
I suppose we can consider ourselves good friends now~
Friends who are closer than family

{短暂停}What I mean to say is,
when hearts naturally resonate with each other,
true friendship isn't bound by time!

<size=30>Shh! I know all about it!</size>
So tell me, have you two not yet
confirmed your feelings for each other?

Hmm? Hello there, you are...
Could it be? A friend of our Astralink liaison?
It's always so fascinating and delightful to see a new face.

Oh, a face I haven't seen before!
The unknown brings such joy,
And that includes new friends. Hello, I'm <color=#8AAB4B>Frostia</color>.

Oh, so you were also
invited here by the contact person...
I was just pondering your name.
Previously talked to this NPC

My name is <color=#8AAB4B>Lauffie</color>,
I'm a clown performer from Metropolis Park!

Yeep-yip~~
Eighteen Strikes of the Dragon Lobster, Strike Thirty-Eight—
<size=64>SOARING LOBSTER IN THE HEAVENS——</size>

While my curls aren't quite the jellyfish style,
I suppose my hairstyle does{短暂停}look a bit similar,
Hmm... it's somewhat cute, just a tiny bit.

When I first wake up is when I feel most wealthy,
Then reality sets in as I brush my hair,
And losing my hair hurts more than losing money or paintbrushes!
Having long hair isn't particularly advantageous just because it grows quickly.

I randomly color each page of my sketchbook,
Then before heading out, I flip to a random page—
Whatever color I land on becomes the theme color for my sketches that day.
We're not actually going to blow up fish in the river, you know.

Sometimes when I'm practicing my martial arts,
I hear a loud "BANG—!"

This morning, I was jumping around in front of Glenn,
and he thought his latest ordered doll had arrived!
He even let out a loud shriek - quite perplexing, indeed.

Though I still can't quite figure it out...
Should the branch be classified as "fine hardwood" or "worthless timber"?

Ever since then, when I have nothing else to sun-dry,
I go and bask in the sunlight myself,
that way, I won't have nightmares at night.
Hmm, what was that flower called again?

The darkness of night conceals many things,
For instance... the ores secretly move around at night,
Yee~ I've witnessed it myself, how fascinating!

There's a wonderful sense of serenity here~
You'll understand if you take the time to explore around.
Fated Rival

Yip-hahaha~yip! All my "knowledge" comes from the "World University" of my travels!
So theoretically speaking, all travelers are my fellow students!

...!
(Draws the short blade "Kaishu")
Oh? A human.

Yeep-hahaha~yip!
Welcome to this place!
May your time here be filled with delight!

Ah, you've finally arrived!
This time my sun-dried blanket has gone missing.
Would the fee for retrieving the blanket be the same as last time's paintbrush incident?

Your name is quite unique!
Though that's no challenge for someone who excels at remembering lines.
<size=30>It's more polite to address people by their names, after all.</size>

Yee~ My intuition tells me there are some wonderful treasures nearby.
Would you like to go mining together?

About our conversation topic...
Hmm, I was thinking...

Even on my eighteenth cast of the rod,
I still feel excitement when I reel it in.
You see, interesting things are often hidden in our daily routines.

To see the eye mask in the mirror,
one must remove the eye mask, but if
one removes the eye mask, then one cannot see it in the mirror.

Would you care to take a walk with me if you're not busy?
I'm quite curious about your Astralink affairs,
Or rather, I'm interested in all things unknown.
That's just great, 'cause my belly fat says it doesn't need any more nutrition.

Most things in this world
Are never quite the same.
You must see them to truly know.

I've heard that "Daily Shortwave" broadcasts
different content in different locations.
Isn't that precisely the antithesis of "being spread too thin"—

Tick tock, tick tock, as these lively moments slip away.
But before we continue,
I'd like to know about your relationship with our Astralink contact.
Dearest Friend

Was it because I forgot to reply to her message last time?
Or was it the time before that when I missed our appointment because I was writing a paper?
Or perhaps...{短暂停}hmm, I can't quite remember...
<color=#695c3a>May I inquire about what our contact person is like at school?</color>

So, I am also a new friend you've made, correct?
Welcome, my new friend.
Yip~! And who might you be? Are you a visitor to our island? Hello there! (Multiplayer Chat Test - Client)
I'll take care of it.

Like when observing Lumia,
catching a whiff of perfume, savoring delightful black tea,
or when certain... mysterious phenomena appear!

So, my friend from afar,
(smirks) How many cups of coffee can you handle?

"Hmm hmm~ Dig a hole, pat the soil,
Let me count one, two, three, four, five~"

If you want to see it, you can find it at the Omni-Gallery!
<size=30>Wait a moment—is that book
even on the shelves there now?</size>

Does the air where you live carry the scent of fresh grass too?
What kind of sights grace your night sky?
And are there any Neighbors as lovely as you there?

Oh, I just came from the Omni-Gallery,
I was conducting my regular observations of vitality convergence points,
and my contact mentioned your Astralink has them too.

Actually, our area produces all kinds of food,
Many of the plants here are quite delectable,
Though the shrub leaves are a bit lacking in flavor - they're more suitable for brewing tea.

I've heard that each Astralink has its own unique ecosystem,
And this Omni-Gallery seems to house some rather rare species,
Thanks, of course, to our Astralink liaison.

The most interesting thing about this place, let me think...
Perhaps it's the gentle breeze,
And the endless expanse of sky...

In certain neighborhoods and cultures, these are regarded as
"objects possessed by spirits,"
becoming objects of fear, or even deified and revered.

Yip~ Hello there, traveler!
As you can see, I'm just taking a leisurely stroll!
Though I must say, the clockwork in my mind never stops turning~

Oh, it's you! <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
What a delightful surprise!
Missing your Astralink companion already?

<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>!
It really is you, {微笑}
How mysterious indeed~.

Regarding my contact here,
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>
how is this relationship defined?

I'm curious to know,
How did <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> become friends with our Astralink contact?

Would you satisfy my little curiosity?
What kind of friend is <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> to our Astralink contact?

I've made a breakthrough!
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color> and our Astralink contact
share a special connection!

<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>!
<size=64>Long time no see!</size>
Wait—didn't we just meet recently?!

Hello there! I'm <color=#8AAB4B>Manna</color>!
Are you <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>?

...Oh?
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, in this encounter,
you seem quite,{短暂停}full of vitality.

No tea, no coffee, no newspaper subscriptions, no...
Oh, it's you, 
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, it's been quite a while!

<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, during your exploration,
have you noticed our Omni-Gallery?
It was fashioned from a tiny world bubble that Momo brought back~.

Oh my, I apologize for mistaking you for someone else again,
I remember you, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
You're most welcome to visit here, and I promise I won't make this mistake next time~.

We meet again! <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>.
I'm craving meat, my tummy is so hungry,
Care to join me for my sixth meal of the day?

...You seem somewhat familiar to me.
Oh! <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
What a pleasant coincidence to meet you again.

By the celestial river above, let the Lumia connect our deck of friendship!
Lauffie, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
and our Astralink liaison are true friends indeed!

You must be the contact person
I've heard so much about -
The legendary <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>!

Have ya eaten yet? You must be <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, our Astralink contact's friend!
Nice to meet you, I'm <color=#8AAB4B>Manna</color>!

<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, you found me~!
Yip! Since we have new visitors,
I wanted to try a new game of hide and seek!

Bhan, Bhan-bhan! Bhan~ Bhan... Bhan!?
Oh, could you be a new friend I haven't met before?
